name: Rhythm Slayer
description:
Prototype of a one-button Rhythm game where you simply have to hit the beats/notes using spacebar. For an optimal experience, downloading the executable for Microsoft Windows is highly recommended, as the WebGL version may either not work at all (on Chrome) or the timing of the beats/notes may be flawed (on most other browsers).

Also note that this prototype was created for a course at the University of Klagenfurt, and for that it includes 2 extra levels that can possibly showcase the Cocktail Party Effect by having 2 extra songs playing at the same time. Therefore, this is not a game purely built for fun, though in the future this may be changed.
